attributes.action: ban the broadcast of music via speakerphone on public transport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We don't allow smoking or eating on public transport because the odours can offend, so why do we allow people to loudly play music, which is often even more offensive? (And can contain offensive lyrics)

There should be a blanket ban on playing playing music via speakerphone on public transport. Headphones aren't that expensive.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
